description: This Java class serves as a global exception handler within a Spring Boot application, providing custom responses for specific exceptions such as NotFoundException and validation errors via MethodArgumentNotValidException. It ensures consistency in error response formatting across the API.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring Boot controller advice that intercepts exceptions thrown during request processing and generates custom JSON error responses.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles NotFoundException and returns a JSON response with timestamp, status, error, and message.

methods.name: handleMethodArgumentNotValid
methods.description: Overrides the default validation error handler to return a structured JSON response containing validation errors for each field.
